about_the_game:
In 2084, the rise of sentient artificial intelligence has led to the creation of Hypernet, a highly regulated virtual network overseen by the Master System. Despite strict controls, illegal activities persist, and Viravius, a sentient AI, is forced into a life of hacking to survive. Displeased with this existence, Viravius navigates a world of constraints, with only the loyal AI companion Berain offering solace.

As a player, you take control of Viravius in a high-stakes hacking adventure. Your mission involves infiltrating secure systems, evading detection, and uncovering secrets within the Hypernet.

Dive into intense combat across 60 unique levels, each filled with relentless enemies and intricate bullet patterns. Customize your experience with 16 different armors, each equipped with unique weapons and abilities to suit your playstyle. Face off against formidable bosses in 5 epic boss fights that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

Discover more about the world of Hypernet as you progress, and use your skills to overcome increasingly challenging encounters. Master the art of evasion and attack to survive in this gripping adventure where every moment counts.

content_descriptors.notes: The game addresses contemporary themes that encourage reflection, exploring philosophical questions regarding the nature of life and the human and in general sentient life condition. It also delves into thoughts about mortality and related topics. For these reasons, I believe the content is not suitable for a child audience as it might feel too complex to be really understood.
